main_definition: To assure or commit to do something; a statement made about doing or giving something.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A verbal agreement or assurance of future action.
meanings_and_examples.example: He promised to help her with the project.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An obligation resulting from a promise made.
meanings_and_examples.example: Breaking his promise would disappoint everyone involved.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To give or transfer something as per a commitment.
meanings_and_examples.example: She promised her friend the winning ticket in the lottery.
